name: Login API should authenticate valid user
description: Verifies that a user can login successfully and receives a valid token or success response
descriptionHtml: Verifies that a user can login successfully and receives a valid token or success response

testStage.description: Verifies that a user can login successfully and receives a valid token or success response

parameters.name: headers
parameters.value: {'Accept': 'application/json, text/plain, */*', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=UTF-8', 'device-id': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/141.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'}
